scripts.test: [ ! -L node_modules ] || rm node_modules && ln -s lib node_modules && SC_SM_ROOT=$(pwd) node --use_strict ./lib/.bin/jest
scripts.coverage: [ ! -L node_modules ] || rm node_modules && ln -s lib node_modules && SC_SM_ROOT=$(pwd) node --use_strict ./lib/.bin/jest --coverage
